website_summaries.verdict: A sturdy, easy to set up canopy tent that provides plenty of shade for wedding guests. Also water resistant in case of a sudden shower.
pros: With multiple colors and three height positions available, customizing for a wedding or other special event is easy
The poles are sturdy, and the solid frame locks securely in place
The polyester fabric top provides shelter from both sun and rain
cons: Can take more than one person to set up
If windy, may need extra support such as sand bags to keep poles from blowing down

customer_reviews.title: 50 mph Gust & Still standing
customer_reviews.text: No matter what brand of tent you buy, you must buy these tent stakes. Not for Back Packing but for car camping, GTT, Ground top tents. I have used these in Zions during a 3 hour, 3"rain at night. with lots of wind, My tent was one of the few still standing in the morning. Last week it was Death Valley & a constant 25mph wind with 50MPH gust. My site was totaly exposed, for 3 days. These stakes held with out an issue.
customer_reviews.author: FJester

customer_reviews.title: not suitable for Rain  Not what I was expecting for  $300.00
customer_reviews.text: This was supposed to be commercial grade and it didn’t let the water drain off , it puddled like a kitty pool Very disappointed costing a $60.00 restocking fee to send back . Can’t see anyone wanting a stretched out canopy Just cost me $60.00 to try it out well my reviews is very disappointed feel mislead by advertising I was wanting a shelter from the elements
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Heckel

customer_reviews.title: The Eurmax Canopy is much better in all ways than other canopys for sale by ...
customer_reviews.text: The Eurmax Canopy is much better in all ways than other canopys for sale by other vendors. If in the unlikely event something needs fixing on this tent the company is there to help and you can get replacement parts where with other companys canopy you would just need directions to the land fill to dispose of the canopy because they do not offer replacement parts and the canopy probably would not be worth fixing to begin with. Buy this canopy , you will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: The Bear

customer_reviews.title: Good Pop-Up, but...
customer_reviews.text: I opted for the one labeled premium due to the fact I want to use it for all-day dog-sport events and wanted sturdy after having lighter-weight shelters fail. This brand was pretty common at the last event and they fared well with severe weather so I purchased one. Easy to put up, love the color option. I'm not going all-in on rating due to the fact the canopy arrived with a sewing defect. They wouldn't replace parts but are sending a total replacement that I will swap out the canopy. I will update my ratings if it arrives and is 100% sewn. The top feels heavy otherwise and the tent is attractive when set up.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa LASHD

customer_reviews.title: Best tent for the money.
customer_reviews.text: It's heavy. The wheels help with this until you have to load it into the truck or anything like that. The weight was, however expected and is not a major drawback because it's been well constructed. The legs are excellent. If you have the extra cargo space to fit this slightly larger tent, I highly recommend it. I have used pop up tents for decades and I would buy this one again. It's easy to put up and down with two people, though slightly different than what you might be used to. I was easily able to do this solo as well. You can't beat it for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Rahr

customer_reviews.title: Product is well made, heavy but easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Reviews were good but I had doubts. Not any more, I now have 2. They are heavy weight tents. It takes 2 to set up but as long as you anchor them to the ground they hold up well. They come with a handy storage bag with wheels so it they are not too bad to transport. I would buy it again. My only beef is the cost to buy replacement top is madness. You can buy a complete new tent for about $40 more. This price policy is very much not customer friendly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid and easy to put up
customer_reviews.text: This is obviously a commercial-grade canopy as all the components are quite solid. Of course, that means that the frame is quite heavy, even on wheels, and one person cannot easily erect the structure (but then who hangs out under a canopy this large by themselves?). My son's lacrosse team is getting quite a lot of use out of this. Might be the best purchase I've made this year. Based on the sturdiness of this product, with care, I expect it to last for many years.
customer_reviews.author: S. Juice

customer_reviews.title: Canopy
customer_reviews.text: We use this for camping trips. We have had several over the years,most of the time it is the canopy material we have had wear out and replacing it is as much as a whole new canopy. We tried this one because we could replace the canopy only at a reasonable cost. The frame is very well built,better than past canopies. The carry bag has very large wheels to roll very easy, We have enjoyed this canopy a lot. Highly recommend it. Wish we had found this one along time ago.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A great intermediate professional awning.
customer_reviews.text: The Eurmax Premium is a good choice if you want something better than the EZ-Up, Caravan, or ABC, but don't want to pay for a thousand dollar awning that is much more difficult to assemble. Note that it is still important to fasten the velcro in the middle of each side of the awning to pull the roof tight so water wont pool in the roof.
customer_reviews.author: Just Another

customer_reviews.title: Well designed and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This is very sturdy and well thought out. I was honestly surprised by both the quality and all the nice touches like velcro and straps just appearing shewn in where ever they are needed. Obviously, it's not especially luxury, so don't expect fancy cloth or anything fancy. It's just a very well designed covering with nice quality. Also, you're going to be much happier with two people putting it up, especially the first time. P.S. The "free" bags for the sand weights were not in my order despite Amazon's description.This seems to be a common issue, but I think it's more about Amazon, so I didn't include that in the rating.
customer_reviews.author: D. Solberg

customer_reviews.title: The best Pop-up tent ever
customer_reviews.text: Worth the money, I was opposed to getting it at first because of the higher cost but I do not regret the decision to buy it at all. We have used it already three times in just the last two months for beach outings with medium to high wind and it did not even phase it. Granted I also bought the sandbags for the legs and the side walls as well. The most sturdy structure to be built for a pop-up.
customer_reviews.author: xcom_vet

customer_reviews.title: Poor response from manufacturer with questions
customer_reviews.text: I have used the canopy one time. It rained the first time we used it. There were drops of water that regularly came down from the top. I emailed the manufacturer to ask if I could coat the outside with something to prevent this. They only wanted pictures and did not say if I could use anything on the seams. I won't use it again for several months and it may not rain then. I would just like to know if I can put something on the seams and not void the warranty. I was not looking to prove I needed a replacement cover.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Canopy and Awesome Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: We've been using our canopy for two track seasons and it works perfectly. It's so easy to put up and it's very sturdy. When we first ordered the canopy, the delivery got lost, and we didn't receive it, but the customer reps from Eurmax sent us another one soon as we told them what happened. We would recommend this product to our friends and would buy it again! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: light444

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipment, Very Easy to setup, Great Price, Great Seller.
customer_reviews.text: This would have made a great popup canopy if UPS did not puncture holes in the tarp that we found after assembling this item. Very big canopy that covers more than enough space needed. Easy to setup and can be setup by one person as long as you can lift the pop up frame. I however had to send this back due to the holes in the top of the canopy that was at no fault of the seller. Fast shipment. The seller gave me my money back with no questions asked. Great canopy. I give this seller 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality
customer_reviews.text: I do pop up fund-raising shows. This tent was easy to set-up and take down, and easily sheltered all of my products from the elements. If you need a tent, invest in this one. Excellent quality.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Sue

customer_reviews.title: A+ Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Our new canopy provided some much needed shade for our stay at the beach. The storage bag with wheels was definitely a plus due to the size and weight of the product. There was small problem at initial setup but Eurmax customer service was quick to find a resolution. Would buy from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: Vera F.

customer_reviews.title: ORANGE color is really bright day-glow hunter SAFETY ORANGE
customer_reviews.text: Called Amazon advising the color did not match the picture. I asked for a replacement set of panels, but was shipped an entire system. Same wierd color. I drag race a Harley Davidson thus wanting ORANGE. Returned the second item at no charge to me. Seems sturdy but panels are rather light weight material. I sure will not get lost in the parking areas- just look for the safety orange tent. Hoping I can dye the panels to a regular orange color.
customer_reviews.author: H-D Destroyer dragster

customer_reviews.title: Excellent (with one limitation)
customer_reviews.text: This product is great, very well designed and easy to assemble. The frame itself is firm and two people can assemble it in a few minutes. Transporting is also very as unit has carrying wheels. The only important limitation to be aware is under heavy rain, the cover could accumulate water. This can be mitigated by making sure the cover is very tightly placed, and also you can consider using some sticks underneath to avoid the puddles on top. Other than that, great.
customer_reviews.author: ck

customer_reviews.title: DISAPPOINTED
customer_reviews.text: I just took this out of the box, easy setup with 2 people. Set it up only to see little holes in the top. So I will have leaks. Now I have to try and patch it up. I shouldn’t have to do this for the money paid for a brand new item.
customer_reviews.author: SheilaT

customer_reviews.title: GOOD STURDY PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: WE OWN A RENTAL COMPANY, AND OWN SEVERAL OF THESE. GOOD STURDY PRODUCT, BUILT TO LAST
customer_reviews.author: lee

customer_reviews.title: There is no useable warranty. I bought two of ...
customer_reviews.text: There is no useable warranty. I bought two of these tents. One is working no problem after one year of weekly use. The second broke at the joints between the bars. It broke within the first year and I contact Eurmax Customer Service. I exchanged emails with Eurmax over the course of two months. I sent them pictures and a copy of the invoice. Then they stopped responding to email. I later called and brought it to their attention. Over the phone, months after they knew I purchased the item from Amazon, they told me I needed to take it up with Amazon. Amazon offered a return minus some fees. Neither offered to honor the warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: This company does not back up its product!
customer_reviews.text: This product was good until it broke within 2 months. Amazon advised me to contact customer service at eurmax since it should still be under warranty. I emailed them on 4 separate occasions. Not one response. I tried to call both numbers on there website and the phone just rang and no one picked up. The other number was a fax number. That is just terrible customer service. This was not a cheap tent but the fact that this company doesn’t return emails or answer the phone is not right. I have never written a review on anything before but this company left me with no choice!
customer_reviews.author: Brian D

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Canopy!
customer_reviews.text: An excellent canopy. I'm 70 yrs. old, 6'2" and over 200 lbs. and strong enough to put it up and take it down by myself, but I admit it is a bit of a struggle. Also, it's 50 lbs. and bulky so having someone to help you makes it so much easier to work with. I really appreciate the sturdy cover it comes in. By using it religiously, my canopy looks cleaner and brighter than all the other vendors I show with.
customer_reviews.author: LDK

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your time with cheaper brands.
customer_reviews.text: If you're doing farmers markets or trade shows every weekend, don't waste your time with any other tent. This thing is a beast. It's heavy, but the wheels on the bag are great and if you can slide it into the back of a van of truck you'll be fine. Built to last. The sides are great too.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan W.

customer_reviews.title: Extremely durable.
customer_reviews.text: I got a tent from a friend that had the standard flimsy stakes. I bought these and was not disappointed. My tent blew in on itself under very high wind, but the stakes didn't budge.
customer_reviews.author: Aethor

customer_reviews.title: Worth the extra money, for sure!
customer_reviews.text: I can’t believe i’m leaving a 5 star review on a canopy tent! I have had so much bad luck with so many brands in the past (maybe 4-5 different brands, all broken within the first few days of mild use). This top I have only used once for 4 days, but it held up like a champ, very sturdy frame & great construction. The only con to this is that it definitely requires two people in order to be put up easily, but that’s due to the size not due to the manufacturing.
customer_reviews.author: J. Sporer

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Canopy Tent !!
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with the high quality feel of the framing materials and top ... very sturdy compared to the cheap alternatives I've owned and seen. Used it while camping near the ocean and it dealt with constant gusts of wind and some rain without issue while others in the campground with smaller cheap 10x10's had collapsed or flipped over. Its relatively heavy, but two people can easily put up and take down. Bag it comes with leaves something to be desired .. actually wore a hole thru the material it in the bed of my truck, but I bought it for outings and backyard gatherings, not for how nice the bag is. Overall, very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a farmers market. Great quality. Easy to put up and fold down with 2 people. Good pins. Good Canopy. Like the dark green to block the sunlight. Seems cooler than a white canopy.
customer_reviews.author: Julie O

customer_reviews.title: Cool in the shade!
customer_reviews.text: The frame is rugged and bolted together rather than using rivets. The legs are hex shaped and much beefier than typical square ones you'd see. The locking mechanisms are solid and secure. The awning fits well and looks good. They even included spare nuts and bolts in the storage bag. It cost a bit more than some others but the step up in quality makes it a pretty good value.
customer_reviews.author: Anon Ymous

customer_reviews.title: Great tent. One reason for purchase was the bag ...
customer_reviews.text: Great tent. One reason for purchase was the bag with rollers. Though a neat concept, the bags wheels do not work!!! Would not recommend if buying for the purpose of the wheels.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Breaks in rain
customer_reviews.text: The first time It rained on this tent it utterly collapsed, breaking in one spot. I can’t recommend this tent if you don’t want all your stuff soaked.
customer_reviews.author: Ivan Z.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Canopy, Okay Carrying Bag.
customer_reviews.text: Great, and I mean absolutely FANTASTIC canopy. Sturdy, easy to set up, plenty of shade. The bag which the canopy comes in is definitely a little lower quality... the stiches around the zipper ripped on day 2 of use on the beach. And it's a little difficult to get it to really lock down in the bag when you fold it with the cover on. But the canopy itself is super!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie K.

customer_reviews.title: Great canopy.
customer_reviews.text: We have now been using this for 8 months now. We purchased this canopy for our farmers market. It provides a lot of shade for our Florida sunshine and rain. It is very stable and deploys easily with two people. We also ordered the bags to fill with sand to hold down the poles on extra windy days. Those work well also. I would recommend this to others.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Frame quality, but!
customer_reviews.text: Frame is very well made and sturdy. The canopy fabric is not sewn correctly and over 3" of the seam has no thread, hence there is an opening in a section of the canopy. Given the price, this quality assurance item should not have been overlooked.
customer_reviews.author: Joe McMillen

customer_reviews.title: No top??? No top!!!
customer_reviews.text: This came without a top! How does that even happen? I have contacted them and will alter the review based on their actions.
customer_reviews.author: islandami

customer_reviews.title: fantastic
customer_reviews.text: solid tent. the supports are strong. With "one on each corner" the set-up is easy. The tent is not light when collapses. Comes with wheels. I'm a 69 year old healthy man and could lift it onto my truck bed. But two people carrying is wiser.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin L McNulty Sr

customer_reviews.title: Euromax Best Ever
customer_reviews.text: As a frequent craft market vendor I’ve seen several quality canopies. Since this brand is owned by friends I saved up to purchase one for me. Definitely worth the price & less than the three cheaper models i have purchased locally that broke from wind or just wore out. Tent is heavy but roller bag helps.
customer_reviews.author: Bianca Boulware Holden

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This eurmax canopy is a great product. I have purchased many pop up tents and they have been very challenging on windy days . This canopy is very durable and holds up well in the wind. I use every month and would recommend . Only complaint is the bag to store is not very durable and needs to be a little bigger .
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy D. Higham

customer_reviews.title: You will not be disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: Couldnt be more happy with this canopy. It is so strong and sturdy, I can hang from the middle poles. It is so easy to set up and take down, and the storage bag is so awesome. We love this canopy and have gotten so many compliments. You will not be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Lydia Morris

customer_reviews.title: The directions could have been much better. Once we got it up it did exactly ...
customer_reviews.text: Heavy but well made. The directions could have been much better. Once we got it up it did exactly what it was supposed to
customer_reviews.author: Philip

customer_reviews.title: Wheel receptacle not threaded
customer_reviews.text: One side has threads on the receptacle so the wheel can be attached. The other one is blank and not threaded so wheel can not be attached. When Eurmax was contacted they said to go this route for resolution. Help. 115 lbs is heavy to care by hand. Willing to change rating depending on what company does to fix the problem.
customer_reviews.author: Christie Ann Harvey

customer_reviews.title: " Excellent quality and workmanship and very easy to set up ...
customer_reviews.text: Although a bit pricier than some "easy-up" type tents, as they say, "You get what you pay for." Excellent quality and workmanship and very easy to set up (not by the included printed instructions but via a "How to" YouTube video). I plan to purchase the 3 additional panals (sides and front) with meshed windows nad door, soon. The wheeled carrier and zippered cover for transporting is a very nice touch.
customer_reviews.author: J. Dollins

customer_reviews.title: Brand new- Leaks at all seams
customer_reviews.text: Leak at all seams the very first time I set it up, brand new out of the package. If you need a canopy for a DRY work space, this canopy is not for you. Customer service is so far dragging their feet with no replies. They return a call 1 time to request pictures, which I sent, and nothing since....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Farmer's Market Treasure!
customer_reviews.text: We started our first Farmer's Market this year and I did months and months of research on popup tents. Chose this one for the durability and customer service previous reviews stated. Let me tell you what... I watch people at the market struggle with theirs... wind and rain... we've suffered through it all. Our tent... two thumbs up. We ended up having people stand under ours while theirs blew apart! Ha ha ha! So... extra 100-200 bucks... I'd say its all worth it! Awesome product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY FOR RAIN!!! IT WILL COLLAPSE!!!
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY FOR USE IN THE RAIN IT WILL COLLAPSE. Rain collected in the fabric causing the plastic connector to break. Scratched my customers truck costing me 4 times what this cost which wasn't cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: Hope they get back to me...
customer_reviews.text: Used it only a few times and it cracked and collapsed. Very sad. Waiting for reply from the company. Hope they can send a new frame. Was great while it was standing.
customer_reviews.author: Shmeitan Mericker

customer_reviews.title: Just what I need a good heavy duty canopy I need for tailgating at THE ...
customer_reviews.text: Just what I need a good heavy duty canopy I need for tailgating at THE Tennessee Titans football game I'll have two cheaper ones that I always have to repair so I decided to buy a good one it is what I expected a good heavy duty canopy
customer_reviews.author: Brent sayles sr

customer_reviews.title: very easy to set up and take down
customer_reviews.text: This canopy is beyond expected, very easy to set up and take down. I used it once in a rainy day, it stood there without any problem. Thanks for the great quality, our stuffs were safe for the show. P.S. the bonus backwall is very useful for my show. I am very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I have previously bought cheaper canopies and get 3-4 uses out of them and throw it away. Finally spent a little extra on this one and absolutely love it. Great quality, sturdy, and best of all it's easy to set up and tear down. The roll away bag is convenient too.
customer_reviews.author: Wisconsin

customer_reviews.title: Your forever canopy
customer_reviews.text: When I searched for a new 10 X 10 canopy, I wanted one that would be around for years to come. I’ve had the cheap canopies before. Not anymore. I love my new canopy and you will too. It’s heavy duty, easy for two people to set up.
customer_reviews.author: M. Gregory

customer_reviews.title: heavier  fabric and better stitched than original
customer_reviews.text: Fits frame tighter. Wider Velcro for sidewalls. Reinforced steel D loops at corners for securing top. Most have plastic loops. Every seam double stitched. Corners really nicely sewn to take stretching and hug frame securily. Perfect replacement fit. Color true to ad. Very happy. I am suree this one will last several seasons and not just one like the original. Overall great replacement and upgrade. I leave mine up all the time next to my RV for shade and rain protection.
customer_reviews.author: Cincy Ken

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put up and take down
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my food truck business to provide shade for our customers. Being on the go we needed something that would last and be able to put up or take down quickly. After doing some research I decided to fork out the big bucks and order it. It was worth the price for us. The case makes it easy to transport and the legs are super sturdy. I would recommend for someone that needs a heavy duty canopy. We fit four 6ft. tables and chairs under the canopy and they fit perfectly. Will definitely order a second one as we grow.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: well built, great price,  Eurmax Canopy,  just better and heavier thank others..............
customer_reviews.text: Great product, heavier than most canopies, good structure extending in the middle of the canopy for strength. Premium version is well worth the difference in price, if nothing else the outside carrying case is much better. Very easy to set up with just one person...Mike Brooks
customer_reviews.author: mike brooks

customer_reviews.title: Shade for our garden break area.
customer_reviews.text: We use this shelter for our break area in the garden. Our previous canopy was not built this sturdy. This shelter is much easier to set up. Looks great, and has a nice storage bag.
customer_reviews.author: GW

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: Used once thus far at the WA beach. It rained, we had wind and sun. We sat under it and we were totally protected. We did have to tether it because of the sever winds....no damage.
customer_reviews.author: Lyssa M. Orelli

customer_reviews.title: High quality and ease of setup
customer_reviews.text: After doing lots of research, I purchased two 10x15 premium Ez Pop up canopies. The quality and ease of setup exceeded my expectations. I would highly recommend the Eurmax canopy for anyone looking for a quality product that will last for years.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Lataille

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and durable
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t used these yet since it’s winter and I need them for this upcoming summer camping season but I’m sure they will be amazing and very sturdy! Everything came quickly in the mail and it’s so nice they added an extra bonus tie down rope! thanks so much!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica A

customer_reviews.title: Built to outlast the pandemic
customer_reviews.text: Using as COVID 19 safe shelter - deep in woods. Avoid my location like the plague. Only one warning shot provided. Ridding this pandemic sheltered by an Euromax Premium. This product will last, but you might not!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: This is a great canopy and will last along time!
customer_reviews.author: apudaddy

customer_reviews.title: Eurmax Galvanized Non-Rust Canopy Stakes work great
customer_reviews.text: We live in Phoenix and the ground is very compact. We could not use regular aluminum anchoring hold-downs to secure our outdoor Christmas display without them bending and refusing to go into the ground. I saw these Eurmax stakes and decided to give them a try. They went into the ground without bending and anchored our lighted sleigh, three reindeer, and gift packages. I was very happy to finally find a solution.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So Easy To Use, High Quality
customer_reviews.text: We have been doing antique and art shows for about 35 years. Wish we would have had this tent a long time ago! So easy to set up and great quality! Very happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Carla Simmonds

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Used it several time. The only problem I had was the middle hinge of each of the legs is directly the same height as the table. So, I had to pull the table away from the leg of the tent. Otherwise, the quality is good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value product
customer_reviews.text: Good quality but a couple of the. Already broke on the plastic piece when pulling them out with the tool. May need to add a rib to that part to make it stronger
customer_reviews.author: Ivan Baez Fierro

customer_reviews.title: Really nice Product!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was really scare to buy something like this over the internet, but it was worth it. This guys use great materials, very durable; The printing was impecable; the set up is really easy. What else i can say? i hardly made a review, but i a really satisfied with what i bought.
customer_reviews.author: Nelson Perez

customer_reviews.title: Strong like bull
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a beast. It is much larger than the average pop up so transport and storage are more difficult, but it will stand up to some punishment!
customer_reviews.author: n-o-sent

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, EASY to setup
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality. Seems to be well built and very sturdy. Setting this up is so easy for being so big. It takes two people about 5 minutes and you're done.
customer_reviews.author: DJordan

customer_reviews.title: Worth the extra money for the quality
customer_reviews.text: Glad we spent the extra $100 for the stronger, better quality canopy. The cheap ones only last 1 or 2 seasons. $ down the drain. It is easy to assemble if there are 2 people.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid and well made
customer_reviews.text: I am using this for an outdoor market and wanted something sturdy enough to hang a few garments on as well. I decided to go mid range. It has exceeded my expectations. It is great quality
customer_reviews.author: Kentucky Transplant

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Good quality pop tent, super easy set up and break down. Yes, best with 2 to 3 people, and it takes some muscle to lift, but it had to be heavy to be this sturdy. We use it for a weekly farmers market, and love it.
customer_reviews.author: christa stosiek

customer_reviews.title: AN AWESOME HEAVY DUTY CANOPY!
customer_reviews.text: This item is of such great, high quality, easy to use, super sturdy and very durable. LOVE the bright color.
customer_reviews.author: R. N.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Tent
customer_reviews.text: This is a great tent. Easy to set up and break down. the quality is well above the others. I will be buying this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for....
customer_reviews.text: Seems nicely made. A little more effort to put up as compared to the pair of employees in the video. Storage bag holds everything with room to spare. Pockets for manuals, spikes, rope, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy construction
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this item as a replacement for a 10' x 10' tent that had wind damage. This is a much bigger canopy that has the easiest setup if there is one person on each corner. Instructions for setup are straight forward. The canopy is constructed of very heavy grade material. Best feature is the hexagon tube for each leg. Worth the extra price!
customer_reviews.author: GisselleT

customer_reviews.title: Awesome and durable canopy
customer_reviews.text: This canopy is so durable and strong. It is everything and more! We are so glad that we purchased this canopy and spent a little more money. It was well worth it!!!! It should lasts for many years to come!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Alls

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.text: Couldn’t be more pleased. Way more sturdy than any I’ve owned. Easy to open and pack alone. Never had a 10x15 that was do-able by one person until now.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Antoine

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed with the design even though the Canopy seems to be made of good material.
customer_reviews.text: I like the heavy duty canopy and basic set up but I was extremely disappointed that my canopy continually sags and holds water whenever it’s been rained on. We take it down when we aren’t having a function but since we’ve experienced more rain then expected we’ve had the canopy up a few times in the rain. I’ve had to punch s broom up under it while buckets of water pour down. Then it remains stretched and saggy. I feel like I paid a lot of money for this so I would have expected it to hold up better. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Munson

customer_reviews.title: High Quality/ heavy Duty
customer_reviews.text: Liked everything. Very beautiful for any event or function. Heavy Duty Construction. This canopy will last a long time if taken care of properly. We took canopy off after using and stored canopy in plastic the way it came. Very Happy with purchase and price.
customer_reviews.author: Suzie

customer_reviews.title: Spend now on this quality and never worry again!
customer_reviews.text: Ultimate tent, spend your money now on this and avoid all the hassle! Be the envy of others. Octagon legs and Wheeled bag and accessories make this more of a winner.
customer_reviews.author: Flatliner

customer_reviews.title: Made well and will keep the rain off you.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. It's super sturdy and made well. But it's not designed for one person to set up. But it easy with two. We use it for many functions. I'm sure we will have many years of enjoyment out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy R. Gayarre

customer_reviews.title: Strong, sturdy, heavier than some.
customer_reviews.text: Great Popup for the price. Construction is A+ Great canopy.
customer_reviews.author: Sgt. Cherry

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy unit, takes two people to lift
customer_reviews.text: Great tent for the price. Velcro strap needs to be re-engineered, straps along canopy sides might help with reducing water pooling
customer_reviews.author: Bill G.

customer_reviews.title: The best tents!
customer_reviews.text: Best tent period! I have used all of the brands and set up tents all the time at track and cross country races, these tents are the best by far!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Buy through Amazon don't buy directly from manufacturer. Placed a order through Eurmax and never received it. Product is really good. Very sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: eurmax prumium canopy 10x 20. legs are rusty, cover top  feels too cheap for almost a 500 dollar iem
customer_reviews.text: nope. frame came along with sone rusty stains on it.. denier cover top feels like 300d at the most not at all 500d. in short, the cover top feels too cheap for almos $ 500 bucks. i m thinking about buying under cover professional 10x 20. aluminum legs, 600d heavy duty cover top.
customer_reviews.author: BAIKAL

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I was very impressed with Eurmax, initially I received a bad canopy but as soon as I contacted them they made it right, Marisol from Eurmax took care of my situation and am satisfied because everyone makes mistakes and they make theirs right!
customer_reviews.author: Reynaldo Garcia III

customer_reviews.title: I think this is the One!
customer_reviews.text: I have put up ones which cost $199 and this is by far the best quality frame and fabric. Definitely a two person deal. It does weigh more, but then again, you get more.
customer_reviews.author: One with Guy

customer_reviews.title: great quality
customer_reviews.text: the quality is far beyond price its easy to put up, strong frame
customer_reviews.author: bawb

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: It collected rain instead of water flowing off and eventually broke damaging my car.
customer_reviews.author: Stepan K.

customer_reviews.title: weak extension clips
customer_reviews.text: The tent seems sturdy enough, but the mechanism for extending the legs is fragile plastic. One of mine was broken upon arrival and I don't doubt the other ones will fail soon enough too. Looks like I'll be using sticks in the holes to extend the legs. Too bad though, because the rest of the tent seems sturdy and well made.
customer_reviews.author: S. M. O

customer_reviews.title: this is a great canopy
customer_reviews.text: I found this canopy to be the best one that I have seen before. The quality is great, the legs are sturdy, the fabric is tough. the only downside is that it is heavy, but it does come with a well done bag that has heavy duty wheels. I would recommend this canopy to anyone that wants a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Russell Wilkinson

customer_reviews.title: Came broken out of the box!
customer_reviews.text: We have been wanting a sturdy ezup canopy for awhile. The construction is great put the quality assurance is lacking. The middle pole locking button does not work. Had to use a bolt to hold the pole up so we can use it for our granddaughters wedding shower!!! Who do I speak to get this item repaired or replaced?
customer_reviews.author: Earl Martin

customer_reviews.title: solid construction good quality I'm going to buy another
customer_reviews.text: I've been dealing with 10 x 10 for over 20 years I wish I would have bought this years ago... solid construction good quality I'm going to buy another one
customer_reviews.author: Aurelio P.

customer_reviews.title: Well Made Product
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and well made product. I ordered one for an outdoor booth and bought a second one the next year.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy McDonald

customer_reviews.title: Its heavy but with wheels its doable.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent choice. Super heavy duty (and super heavy) but will last and last for fairs and pop-ups!
customer_reviews.author: deborah williams

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: This is a sturdy canopy. Not so easy for two people to put together. Seems to be very durable. Sad to see the price dropped $40 less than 2 weeks after purchasing it. It was packed well and arrived on time. Overall, happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Larena

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put up and comes with a very nice
customer_reviews.text: So impressed with the quality of this canopy. Easy to put up and comes with a very nice, durable roller bag.
customer_reviews.author: CarrieS

customer_reviews.title: Defective cover, workmanship
customer_reviews.text: Brand new out of the box. Stitching coming out of the cover.
customer_reviews.author: Terry G Sopko

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: Very well made. Looking forward to many years of use.
customer_reviews.author: David E Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Great durable product
customer_reviews.text: Great quality product. Its heavy and is more suitable for two person set up.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Herriman

customer_reviews.title: Used canopy sold as new?
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice canopy, however the one I received appears to be used. The white top had stains, one of the legs was dented and the zipper for carrying case was broken.
customer_reviews.author: Robert M. Hines

product_meta.title: Eurmax Premium 10 x 20 EZ Pop up Canopy Tent Wedding Party Canopies Gazebo Shade Shelter Commercial Grade Bonus Wheeled Bag (White)
feature_bullets: Eurmax Canopy is most trusted & best selling pop up canopy brand based in the USA. We stock all kinds of accessories and parts for the products we are selling and if you have anything about our products, we are ready to help you.

10x20 Commercial Canopy Tent Frame: It can make your canopy stand out from the crowd in Market stall/Market Trade Show. (1)1.6” hexagon shaped leg,much stronger than those in the market. (2)Hammertone powder coated finishing,good looking and rust resistance. (3)The latest thumb button release levers:latest technology in industry.It makes set-up and close real comfortable and reliable. (4)Three height positions,clearance height from 6.4ft,6.7ft to 7ft.Peak height from 10.5ft,10.8ft to 11.1ft.

10x20 Canopy Tent Top Cover:(1)Stitching lines are all seam sealed to prevent water penetrate from seams to make our canopy tent waterproof. (2)CPAI-84 fire retardant certificated 500D polyester PU coated to block 99% UV rays. (3)Front Valance With 4 name banner loops,you can personalize your shelter. (4)Steel D Rings on each corner,easy to use a rope to secure your canopy. (5)Velcro Straps with Truss Muscle on each valance to keep the canopy stick on the frame especially in some windy days.

10x20 Canopy Tent Roller Bag: (1)1680D polyester fabric with PVC coating to make it 100% waterproof. (2)The large 4.7” wheels on high-strength corrosion-resistant aluminum pallet,it makes portability easy and smooth even on rough ground. (3)Eurmax unique L shaped roller bag is oversize designed,big enough for storage the top left on the frame.You don’t need to remove the top after each use. (4)We also put some spare parts in the bag pocket for your future use.

The Package Includes: 10x20 Commercial pop up canopy Frame + 10x20 canopy tent top cover + 10x20 Canopy tent roller bag + spare parts.It can be set up and taken down easily by 1 or 2 person in minutes without any tools. 1 year warranty and lifetime accessories and parts supply.We also do the custom job.Please be free to contact us if there are any problems, 100% satisfaction guarantee.
